name: The Aurelia Blog - Page 15
description: The official blog of the Aurelia project and Core Team.

posts.name: More Aurelia Workshops in Europe
posts.description: In March we had the opportunity to do our second workshop in Europe. The two-day workshop in London was a fantastic success, having sold out multiple times over. Since then we've refined our training materials and we're bringing more workshops to Europe.

posts.name: Aurelia's New Validation and Testing Capabilities
posts.description: Today we've got the initial releases of our new validation overhaul as well as the first release of some new testing capabilities. As usual, we've got a bunch of additional bug fixes and enhancements to performance as well. Read on for the details.

posts.name: Aurelia CLI, Debug Tools and Microsoft Collaboration
posts.description: The Aurelia team is hard at work preparing for our Release Candidate...but that's not all we're working on. We're always looking for ways to improve tooling, debugging and collaboration with community members and other vendors along the way.

posts.name: Aurelia Mid April 2016 Patch Update
posts.description: In our continued march towards RC, we've released a number of patches to Aurelia libraries. For the most part, these improve support for Webpack, TypeScript and various cross-browser scenarios. For more details, we provide the changelog below.

posts.name: Aurelia on .NET Rocks
posts.description: If you are a .NET developer...or really any developer interested in hearing some discussion on Aurelia, check out the latest .NET Rocks episode [http://www.dotnetrocks.com/?show=1279].

posts.name: Aurelia Late March Patch Update
posts.description: In the last month we've accomplished a couple of major goals on our way to the official v1 release of Aurelia: updating to Babel 6, removing required external polyfills and dual compatibility with JSPM 16 and 17. This week, we've got a few fixes and some extra goodies.
